name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-dashboards
title: Application Insights and Cost Management Dashboards
shortDescription: Sharing Application Insights and solution's cost information with your stakeholders typically requires either using _Azure Dashboards_ or using _Power BI_. This sample solution allows displaying this dashboards directly in a SharePoint site or a tab in MS Teams, moving it close to the users.
longDescription: Sharing Application Insights and solution's cost information with your stakeholders typically requires either using _Azure Dashboards_ or using _Power BI_. This sample solution allows displaying this dashboards directly in a SharePoint site or a tab in MS Teams, moving it close to the users.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
